Uses of Class
items.Item

Packages that use Item 
Package Description
gui
Contains all the GUI classes and modules
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
items
Contains all upgrades and item classes
main
Core package - Contains all the important classes that can't be categorized
ships
Contains all the ships

  • Uses of Item in items

    Subclasses of Item in items 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Cannon
    Cannons are upgrade items, used to increase combat rolls.
    class  Sail
    Sails are upgrade items, used to decrease the time to get between Islands.
    class  TradeGood
    A tradable good.
    class  Upgrade
